00033 
00034 parent_component_proxy::parent_component_proxy(const sc_module_name & nm): uvm_ml_special_component(nm) {
00035 }
00036 
00037 parent_component_proxy * parent_component_proxy::create(const string & parent_full_name, // Static method
00038                                                         int            parent_framework_id,
00039                                                         int            parent_junction_node_id) {
00040 
00041     parent_component_proxy * ret = NULL;
00042     uvm_component * context_component = NULL;
00043 
00044     size_t first_dot = parent_full_name.find(".");
00045     if(first_dot == string::npos) {
00046         // Parent full name is simple, no dots
00047         ret =  new parent_component_proxy(sc_module_name(parent_full_name.c_str()));
00048     }
00049     else {
00050         // Need to build auxiliary dummy hierarchy in order to work around the fact 
00051         // that the instance name cannot be dotted
00052         ret = uvm_ml_utils::create_parent_proxy_with_helpers(NULL, parent_full_name);
00053     }
00054     if (context_component != NULL)
00055         sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_pop();
00056 
00057     if (ret != NULL)
00058       uvm_ml_utils::add_parent_proxy(ret, parent_framework_id, parent_junction_node_id);
00059 
00060     return ret;
00061 }
00062 
00063 int parent_component_proxy::add_node(const char * child_type_name, 
00064                                      const char * child_instance_name) {
00065     int node_id = -1;
00066 
00067     simcontext()->hierarchy_push( this );
00068     uvm_component * comp = uvm_factory::create_component(child_type_name, name(), child_instance_name);
00069     simcontext()->hierarchy_pop();
00070     if (comp) {
00071       node_id = uvm_ml_utils::add_quasi_static_tree_node(comp);
00072     }
00073     return node_id;
00074 }

00077 
00078 uvm_ml_proxy_helper::uvm_ml_proxy_helper(const sc_module_name & name): uvm_ml_special_component(name) {
00079 }
00080 
00081 uvm_ml_proxy_helper::uvm_ml_proxy_helper(const sc_module_name & nm, const string & remaining_path): uvm_ml_special_component(nm) {
00082   size_t dot_pos = remaining_path.find(".");
00083 
00084   if (dot_pos == string::npos) {
00085     m_proxy = new parent_component_proxy(sc_module_name(remaining_path.c_str()));
00086     // Save it because the helper may be later deleted
00087   } else {
00088     string next_instance_name = remaining_path.substr(0, dot_pos);
00089     string next_remaining_path = remaining_path.substr(dot_pos + 1);
00090     uvm_ml_proxy_helper * child_helper = 
00091       new uvm_ml_proxy_helper(sc_module_name(next_instance_name.c_str()), next_remaining_path);
00092     m_proxy = child_helper->get_proxy();
00093   }
00094 }
00095 
00096 // Find an existing hierarchical tree for the new parent proxy
00097 // To substitute missing hierarchical instances (belonging to foreign languages) - create dummy helper components
00098 // The latter is done in a recursive manner
00099 
00100 parent_component_proxy * uvm_ml_utils::create_parent_proxy_with_helpers(sc_module *    parent_helper,
00101                                                                         const string & path)
00102 {
00103   parent_component_proxy * proxy = NULL;
00104 
00105   size_t remaining_path_pos = path.find(".");
00106 
00107   if (remaining_path_pos == string::npos) {
00108       if (parent_helper)
00109           sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_push(parent_helper);
00110       proxy = new parent_component_proxy(sc_module_name(path.c_str()));
00111       if (parent_helper)
00112           sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_pop();
00113   } else {
00114       // The helpers and the proxy must be instantiated recursively in order to build the correct full path
00115       string instance_name = path.substr(0,remaining_path_pos);
00116       string full_name;
00117       if (parent_helper == NULL)
00118           full_name = instance_name;
00119       else {
00120           full_name = string(parent_helper->name()) + "." + instance_name;
00121       }
00122       string remaining_path = path.substr(remaining_path_pos+1);
00123 
00124       sc_object * old_object = sc_find_object(full_name.c_str());
00125 
00126       if (old_object == NULL) {
00127           if (parent_helper)
00128               sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_push(parent_helper);
00129           
00130           uvm_ml_proxy_helper * helper = new uvm_ml_proxy_helper(sc_module_name(instance_name.c_str()), remaining_path);
00131           if (parent_helper)
00132               sc_core::sc_get_curr_simcontext()->hierarchy_pop();
00133           proxy = helper->get_proxy();
00134       }
00135       else {
00136         sc_module * old_module = dynamic_cast<sc_module *>(old_object);
00137         assert (old_module != NULL);
00138 
00139         proxy = create_parent_proxy_with_helpers(old_module, remaining_path);
00140       }
00141   }
00142   return proxy;
00143 }

00146 
00147 map<int /* parent junction node id */, parent_component_proxy *>  uvm_ml_utils::parent_proxies;
00148 
00149 void uvm_ml_utils::add_parent_proxy(parent_component_proxy * proxy,
00150                                     int                      parent_framework_id,
00151                                     int                      parent_junction_node_id)
00152 {
00153     proxy->SetParentFrameworkId(parent_framework_id);
00154     proxy->SetId(parent_junction_node_id);
00155     parent_proxies[parent_junction_node_id] = proxy;
00156 }
00157 
00158 parent_component_proxy * uvm_ml_utils::find_parent_proxy_by_id(int parent_junction_node_id)
00159 {
00160     return parent_proxies[parent_junction_node_id];
00161 }
00162 
00163 static vector<child_component_proxy *>child_proxies;
00164 
00165 child_component_proxy * uvm_ml_create_component(const string &        target_framework_indicator, 
00166                                                 const string &        component_type_name, 
00167                                                 const string &        instance_name,
00168                                                 const uvm_component * parent)
00169 {
00170     string parent_name;
00171   
00172     parent_name = parent->name();
00173 
00174     uvm_set_config_string("*", "uvm_ml_type_name",   component_type_name);
00175     uvm_set_config_string("*", "uvm_ml_inst_name",   instance_name);
00176     uvm_set_config_string("*", "uvm_ml_parent_name", parent_name);
00177     uvm_set_config_string("*", "uvm_ml_frmw_id",     target_framework_indicator);
00178 
00179     child_component_proxy *p = new child_component_proxy(instance_name.c_str());
00180     child_proxies.push_back(p);
00181 
00182     return p;
00183 }
